name: if I'm broken, you are too.
name_original: if I'm broken, you are too.
description:
A short, conversation-length twine game about a writer confronting the monster they've created - and how much the monster reflects themselves. Written for Narrascope Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Growth." 

It's a prototype, as I might return to it in the future! I recommend putting it in full screen.

content warning: body horror, implied death

Thank you to AK Fedeau and Grim Baccaris for Twine help!
